sentences.english: Museums and the Smithsonian Institution buildings are on the north and south sides of the Mall.

sentences.english: Since 1990,46 patients have underwent surgical management of Tetralogy of Fallot.

sentences.english: A study of the fermentative production of lycopene by Blakeslea trispora is reported.

sentences.english: The use of extra-amniotic saline infusion with a balloon catheter or a double balloon catheter (Atad ripener) also appears to be effective for cervical ripening.

sentences.english: The metal stag is emblazed on every bottle to represent the clan MacKenzie.

sentences.english: We name the author of the works for which we don't know the author "Yiminshi".
